/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the city's organized chaos. Above, the sky is a vibrant blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's architectural details.
